Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Canadian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Canadian Ambassador to the DPRK Marius Grinius at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Dec. 7.
 On hand were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the Canadian embassy.    
 After receiving credentials Kim Yong Nam had a conversation with the ambassador.

articles.content:
Greetings to President of Gabon
    Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to El Hadi Omar Bongo today upon his reelection as president of Gabon.
 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop in the interests of the two peoples, the message wished him good health and greater success in his responsible work for prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Minutes of Talks Signed between DPRK and China
articles.content:
North Side Delegation Leaves
    Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the north side preparatory committee for joint functions of Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for implementing the June 15 joint declaration headed by Chairman An Kyong Ho left here today by train to attend the meeting of the June 15 joint committee to be held in Shenyang, China.

articles.title: North-South Talks on Sports
articles.content:
Minutes of Talks Signed between DPRK and China
    Beijing, December 6 (KCNA) -- The minutes of the 13th round of the talks on scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation in meteorology between the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the State Meteorological Bureau of China was signed in Beijing on December 6.
 Present at the signing ceremony were members of the delegation of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK headed by Director Ko Il Hun, the director of the State Meteorological Bureau of China and officials concerned.
